title: Avoid the Death Route! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Caring Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Kidnappings   Magic   Nobles   Otome Game   Overprotective Siblings   Reincarnated in Another World   Reverse Harem   Sister Complex   Spirits   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Minazuki Shizuru   水無月 静琉
description:
Wait a moment!? This is a dream, right? Eh, it’s my future!? This is the world of an Otome Game? Seriously!? I have to do something or my future will be hopeless……

※※※

Victoria noticed that she transmigrated into​ a different world. However, in that otome game like world she’s the villainess and was stunned that just about everything leads to the worst future. Victoria struggles in order to wreck such a future.>
